list_variables.description: A name of a group to which you want to add the user.
list_variables.name: Groups

list_variables.description: One or more managed policy ARNs to attach to this user.
list_variables.name: ManagedPolicyArns

list_variables.description: The policies to associate with this user. For information about policies, see                      Overview of Policies in [Using IAM].
list_variables.name: Policies

variables.description: Creates a login profile so that the user can access the AWS Management Console.
variables.name: LoginProfile

variables.description: The path for the user name. For more information about paths, see Identifiers                   for IAM Entities in Using AWS Identity and Access Management.
variables.name: Path

variables.description: Returns the Amazon Resource Name (ARN) for the specified AWS::IAM::User resource. For example:                      arn:aws:iam::123456789012:user/mystack-myuser-1CCXAFG2H2U4D.
variables.name: Arn
